013package org.postgresql.pljava.example;
014
015import java.sql.Connection;
016import java.sql.DriverManager;
017import java.sql.ResultSet;
018import java.sql.ResultSetMetaData;
019import java.sql.SQLException;
020import java.sql.Statement;
021import java.util.ArrayList;
022import java.util.Iterator;
023
024/**
025 * Provides a {@link #executeSelect function} that takes any SQL {@code SELECT}
026 * query as a string, executes it, and returns the {@code ResultSet} produced
027 * as a single string column, the first row being a header, then one per row
028 * of the {@code ResultSet}, semicolons delimiting the original columns.
029 * @author Filip Hrbek
030 */
031public class ResultSetTest {
032    public static Iterator<String> executeSelect(String selectSQL) throws SQLException {
033        if (!selectSQL.toUpperCase().trim().startsWith("SELECT ")) {
034            throw new SQLException("Not a SELECT statement");
035        }
036
037        return new ResultSetTest(selectSQL).iterator();
038    }
039
040    private ArrayList<String> m_results;
041
042    public ResultSetTest(String selectSQL) throws SQLException {
043        Connection conn = DriverManager
044                .getConnection("jdbc:default:connection");
045        m_results = new ArrayList<>();
046        StringBuffer result;
047
048        Statement stmt = conn.createStatement();
049        ResultSet rs = stmt.executeQuery(selectSQL);
050        ResultSetMetaData rsmd = rs.getMetaData();
051
052        int cnt = rsmd.getColumnCount();
053        result = new StringBuffer();
054        for (int i = 1; i <= cnt; i++) {
055            result.append((rsmd.getColumnName(i) + "("
056                    + rsmd.getColumnClassName(i) + ")").replaceAll("(\\\\|;)",
057                    "\\$1") + ";");
058        }
059        m_results.add(result.toString());
060
061        while (rs.next()) {
062            result = new StringBuffer();
063            Object rsObject = null;
064            for (int i = 1; i <= cnt; i++) {
065                rsObject = rs.getObject(i);
066                if (rsObject == null) {
067                    rsObject = "<NULL>";
068                }
069                result.append(rsObject.toString()
070                        .replaceAll("(\\\\|;)", "\\$1") + ";");
071            }
072            m_results.add(result.toString());
073        }
074        rs.close();
075    }
076
077    public void close() {
078    }
079
080    private Iterator<String> iterator() {
081        return m_results.iterator();
082    }
083}
